content:
/>
XIII.i.3.A.6.b
.
SOJ Notification of an Initial Determination of Prima Facie Eligibility
If treatment based on prima facie eligibility is initially authorized by VHA, then VHA
prepares a
VA Form 10-7131
and annotates the form to show
Medical care being authorized for
[condition]
on prima facie evidence of eligibility
, and
forwards the completed form along with a copy of the VA examination, hospital report, or outpatient treatment report, as applicable, to the station of jurisdiction (SOJ).
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - General Information on Eligibility for Medical Services
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A
